happy: Are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears!
Is your name Google? Because you've got everything I've been searching for!
Do you have a map? I keep getting lost in your eyes!
Are you a camera? Because every time I look at you, I smile!
sad: My heart was broken, but seeing you just fixed it!
I must be a broken clock, because time stops when I see you!
They say time heals all wounds, but you heal them faster!
I was feeling down, but then you walked in and lit up my world!
romantic: If kisses were snowflakes, I'd send you a blizzard!
Is your name Wi-Fi? Because I'm really feeling a connection!
You must be a keyboard, because you're just my type!
Are you French? Because Eiffel for you!
